title: Betplay Group
author: Betplay Group
content: Embrace success with the most recent tournament! You are cordially invited to take part in the Pragmatic Play Casino’s Drops and Wins network competition hosted by Betplay.io. The winners of this network event will get a prize pool totaling EUR 245,000. You will have an exciting experience with fantastic victories because this series comprises three weekly tournaments!The entertaining competition will be held from April 12 to May 3, 2023.Tournament Schedule:· Week 1: April 12, 2023, 7:01 pm CET to April 19, 2023, 6:59 pm CET· Week 2: April 19, 2023, 7:01 pm CET to April 26, 2023, 6:59 pm CET· Week 3: April 26, 2023, 7:01 pm CET to May 3, 2023, 6:59 pm CETThere is no minimum bet for this campaign. The exciting tourney is also accessible in the currencies such as USD, BRL, THB, TND, and TRY.To join, you can play any of Pragmatic Play’s participating games like Wolf Gold, Mustang Gold, Sweet Bonanza, John Hunter and the Tomb of the Scarab Queen, Great Rhino Megaways, John Hunter and the Book of Tut, The Dog House, The Dog House Megaways, Chill Heat, Fruit Party, Big Bass Bonanza and many more!If you have any questions concerning the campaign, feel free to contact us via our live chat service or message us here.
